20101209152621.000|20101209152622.429|CCO|THAT'S WHAT THEY'RE HOPING, BY 
20101209152622.429|20101209152623.857|CCO|MAKING IT THAT GRAPHIC AND 
20101209152623.857|20101209152625.286|CCO|OBVIOUS, PEOPLE WILL REALIZE 
20101209152625.286|20101209152626.714|CCO|THAT.

20101209152629.571|20101209152631.000|CCO|THAT'S A LOT.
20101209152631.000|20101209152633.000|CCO|>> CAN IT CAUSE DAMAGE 
20101209152633.000|20101209152635.000|CCO|IMMEDIATELY, AND CAN YOU RECOVER
20101209152635.000|20101209152637.000|CCO|FROM THAT?
